Docs.summary: Indicates that an API is supported for a specified platform or operating system. If a version is specified, the API cannot be called from an earlier version.
Docs.remarks: You can apply this attribute multiple times for different operating systems.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string platformName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the operating system to which the API applies, optionally including a version.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
